item.title: 拉斯维加斯赌场老板推出货币优惠吸引加拿大游客
item.description: 拉斯维加斯赌场经营者德里克·史蒂文斯将接受与美元等值的加元，以期挽回其旗下三家拉斯维加斯赌场的顾客。【原文：Las Vegas casino operator Derek Stevens will accept Canadian dollars on a par with the US currency in a bid to win back guests at his three Las Vegas properties.】

item.title: 小型股有望创下自1996年以来对标普500指数的最长连胜纪录
item.description: 今年以来，小盘股的每日表现都优于大盘股。【原文：Small-capitalization stocks are outperforming their bigger peers every day this year.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会寻求新途径推进陷入停滞的阿达尼欺诈案
item.description: 在未能向高塔姆·阿达尼送达法律传票逾一年后，美国证券交易委员会希望法官为该机构推进针对这位印度亿万富翁的欺诈案扫清障碍。【原文：After failing to serve Gautam Adani with a legal summons for more than a year, the US Securities and Exchange Commission wants a judge to clear a way for the agency to advance with its fraud case against the Indian billionaire.】

item.title: 奈飞首席内容官萨兰多斯将出席参议院听证会就华纳并购案作证
item.description: 网飞公司联合首席执行官泰德·萨兰多斯计划于2月在美国参议院委员会听证会上作证，该听证会旨在审查该公司拟以827亿美元收购华纳兄弟探索公司流媒体业务及影视制作部门的交易。【原文：Netflix Inc. co-Chief Executive Officer Ted Sarandos is planning to testify in February at a US Senate committee hearing looking into his company’s proposed $82.7 billion purchase of the streaming and studio operations of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行计划在与安盛投资管理整合过程中裁减约1,200个岗位
item.description: 法国巴黎银行正寻求裁减约1,200个职位，以完成对资产管理公司安盛投资管理公司的整合。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is seeking to eliminate about 1,200 positions as it completes the integration of the asset management unit Axa Investment Managers.】

item.title: 本杰瑞独立董事在巨无霸之争中败退
item.description: 本杰瑞冰淇淋公司董事会中的独立董事席位已被实质性清空，这标志着这家以社会使命著称的冰淇淋品牌与其母公司Magnum冰淇淋公司之间的纠纷再度升级。【原文：Ben & Jerry’s was effectively stripped of independent directors from its board, in the latest escalation of a dispute between the ice-cream brand known for its social mission and parent Magnum Ice Cream Co.】

item.title: 加密货币公司BitGo首次公开募股筹集2.128亿美元后，股价首日大涨25%
item.description: 加密货币公司BitGo Holdings Inc.及其部分支持者在美国首次公开募股中筹集了2.128亿美元后，该公司股票开盘价较IPO价格上涨25%。【原文：BitGo Holdings Inc. shares opened 25% above their IPO price, after the crypto firm and some of its backers raised $212.8 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国地区性银行竞相涌入高评级债券市场融资
item.description: 美国地区性银行正争相进入投资级债券市场融资，这表明市场正趋于平静——此前因特朗普总统就格陵兰岛问题引发的争议以及日本债券抛售潮，本周早些时候曾令投资者感到不安。【原文：US regional banks are racing to the investment-grade debt market for funding, signaling calmer waters after tensions over President Donald Trump’s dispute over Greenland and a selloff in Japanese bonds unsettled investors earlier this week.】

item.title: 米莱认为阿根廷尚未准备好实行自由浮动比索汇率
item.description: 自2023年就任以来，哈维尔·米莱不得不将许多激进主张调整为治理阿根廷的现实方案。他曾称之为"杀手"的中国官员，如今成了"重要的贸易伙伴"。他誓言要烧毁的中央银行依然矗立。关于美元化的讨论已悄然终止。【原文：Since taking office in 2023, Javier Milei has had to adapt many of his radical ideas to the realities of governing Argentina. Chinese officials he once called “assassins” turned into “great trade partners.” The central bank he pledged to burn down is still standing. Talk of dollarization has ceased.】

item.title: 加拿大喷气机公司通过扮演空战中的"反派角色"获利
item.description: 随着特朗普政府颠覆持续数十年的安全联盟，欧洲各国正迅速增加国防预算。对一家加拿大公司而言，这意味着巨大商机——以及可能的上市之路。【原文：European nations are rapidly increasing their defense budgets as the Trump administration upends a security alliance that has lasted for decades. For a Canadian firm, that means big business — and a possible pathway to going public.】

item.title: 千禧年公司创立新型信用交易业务
item.description: 千禧管理公司正从其固定收益业务中剥离出一个专门的信贷交易部门，这是这家多策略对冲基金巨头最新的一项变革举措。【原文：Millennium Management is carving out a dedicated credit trading unit from its fixed income business in the latest change at the multistrategy hedge fund giant.】

item.title: 华尔街不愿谈论特朗普
item.description: 达沃斯正展示银行家们应对美国总统的第一生存法则：不谈论他。【原文：Davos is showcasing bankers’ first rule of surviving the US president: you don’t talk about him.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率从三年低点小幅回升，达到6.09%
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率从三年低点攀升，因对格陵兰岛可能引发贸易战的担忧推高了政府债券收益率——这些债券是住房贷款的基准利率。【原文：US mortgage rates climbed from a three-year low as fears about a potential trade war over Greenland drove up yields for the government bonds that guide home loans.】

item.title: 智利卡普斯顿矿因罢工停产
item.description: 智利北部卡普斯通铜业公司的一座矿山因持续近三周的劳工罢工而停产，导致全球市场供应进一步趋紧。【原文：Production at a Capstone Copper Corp. mine in northern Chile has halted amid a nearly three-week labor strike, further tightening the global market.】

item.title: 美国国债下跌，就业与支出数据支持美联储暂停加息
item.description: 美国经济数据显示就业市场和消费者支出具有韧性，这强化了交易员对美联储将推迟降息至2026年后期的预期。【原文：Traders’ expectations that the Federal Reserve will delay interest-rate cuts until later in 2026 were reinforced by US economic data showing resilience in the job market and consumer spending.】

item.title: 特斯拉明年将向公众发售Optimus机器人，马斯克表示
item.description: 特斯拉公司首席执行官埃隆·马斯克表示，该公司很可能在明年年底前向公众发售Optimus机器人。他指出，这家汽车制造商的命运将日益依赖于人形机器人的发展。【原文：Tesla Inc. will probably sell its Optimus robots to the public by the end of next year, according to Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk, who’s said the carmaker’s fortunes will be increasingly dependent on humanoid machines.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，马斯克的SpaceX公司已安排多家银行牵头其首次公开募股（IPO）事宜。
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，SpaceX已敲定四家银行牵头其首次公开募股事宜。这家由埃隆·马斯克创立的火箭与卫星公司正推进史上最大规模上市计划。【原文：SpaceX has lined up four banks to lead its initial public offering, according to the Financial Times, as Elon Musk’s rocket and satellite firm moves forward with plans for the biggest-ever listing.】

item.title: 太阳石油油砂事故致死事件系前任首席执行官离职后首起
item.description: 加拿大太阳石油公司（Suncor Energy Inc.）一处工地发生工人死亡事故，这是这家油砂公司在2022年因连串致命事故导致前首席执行官辞职后首次出现死亡案例。【原文：The death of a worker at a Suncor Energy Inc. site in Canada marked the first fatality for the oil sands company since a former chief executive stepped down in 2022 after a spate of deadly incidents.】

item.title: LiveKit，OpenAI语音工具供应商，完成1亿美元融资
item.description:
由Index Ventures领投的融资轮将公司估值推高至10亿美元

【原文：

Funding round led by Index Ventures values company at $1 billion

】

item.title: CVC寻求通过其GSG体育特许经营权筹集27.5亿欧元
item.description: 凯鹏华盈资本正计划以其体育特许经营权为抵押筹集27.5亿欧元（约合32亿美元）债务融资。该集团的投资领域涵盖西班牙足球顶级联赛、英格兰职业橄榄球、排球及女子网球等项目。【原文：CVC Capital Partners is looking to raise €2.75 billion ($3.2 billion) of debt against its sports franchise, whose investments range from Spanish football’s top division and English professional rugby to volleyball and women’s tennis.】

item.title: 谷歌允许用户利用照片和电子邮件中的数据定制人工智能搜索
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet正推出一项新功能，通过调用这家科技巨头旗下其他应用程序的用户数据来个性化搜索结果，这是其最新举措，旨在保持领先于OpenAI等竞争对手的优势。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is rolling out a new option to personalize search results by tapping user data from the tech giant’s other applications, its latest bid to keep ahead of competition from the likes of OpenAI.】

item.title: 加拿大通胀数据将在休市期间公布，引发不满
item.description: 加拿大中央统计机构计划在下月该国金融市场休市期间发布重要通胀数据——经济学家警告称此举将扭曲交易并使外国投资者占据优势。【原文：Canada’s central statistics agency plans to publish a major inflation print while the country’s financial markets are closed next month — a move economists warn will distort trading and give foreign investors an edge.】

item.title: 南非将重新审议糖价触发机制，因进口激增
item.description: 南非国际贸易管理委员会计划重新评估食糖基准价格，因进口产品大量涌入正严重打击本土生产商。【原文：South Africa’s International Trade Administration Commission plans to review the reference price for sugar amid a flood of imports crippling local producers.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉将审议允许私营销售和仲裁的石油法案
item.description: 据彭博社获得的法案草案显示，委内瑞拉将于周四就一项提案展开辩论。该提案将允许私营石油公司对其自身产量进行商业化运营，降低其税负，并允许通过仲裁解决纠纷，而非仅限于委内瑞拉法院。【原文：Venezuela is set to debate a proposal on Thursday that would allow private oil companies to commercialize their own production, pay less in taxes and settle disputes through arbitration, rather than exclusively in Venezuelan courts, according to a draft bill seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 矿企下调2026年黄金铜产量预期后，伦丁股份股价暴跌
item.description: 加拿大公司伦丁矿业公司下调黄金和铜产量预期后，其股价创下逾一年来最大跌幅，该公司表示其坎德拉里亚矿区的地下开采率有所下降。【原文：Lundin Mining Corp. shares fell the most in more than a year after the Canadian company cut its output guidance for gold and copper, citing lower underground minning rates at its Candelaria site.】

item.title: 前维京基金经理内蒂米连续第三年实现逾20%的收益增长
item.description: 迪维娅·内蒂米（Divya Nettimi）的对冲基金去年净收益飙升21.2%，自2022年末这家选股公司成立以来，已连续第三年实现两位数增长。【原文：Divya Nettimi’s hedge fund soared a net 21.2% last year, marking a third-straight year of double-digit gains since the stock-picking firm was founded in late 2022.】

item.title: 雀巢启动水业务部门出售，银行准备提供高达30亿欧元债务融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，雀巢公司正推进出售其价值50亿欧元（约合58亿美元）的饮用水业务部分股权，该业务旗下拥有知名品牌巴黎水和圣培露。【原文：Nestlé SA is forging ahead with the sale of a stake in its €5 billion ($5.8 billion) water business, which includes the well-known brands Perrier and S.Pellegrino, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 丹纳塔拉携120亿美元战备资金迈入部署时代
item.description: 印尼主权财富基金丹纳塔拉首席投资官表示，随着该基金从初创阶段转向大规模投资，正加速部署约120亿美元资金，并准备进军全球债务市场。【原文：Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara is ramping up deployment of about $12 billion and preparing to tap global debt markets as it shifts from start-up mode to large-scale investing, its chief investment officer said.】

item.title: 奥兰多·布拉沃指出风投公司正“争相涌入任何能找到的人工智能项目”
item.description: 亿万富翁私募股权高管奥兰多·布拉沃表示，人工智能初创企业的估值已飙升至天文数字，这源于风险投资公司对错失下一个重大投资机会的恐惧。【原文：Valuations for artificial intelligence startups have soared to astronomical levels, fueled by venture capital firms’ fear of missing out on the next big deal, billionaire private equity executive Orlando Bravo said.】

item.title: 美国消费者支出连续两个月强劲增长
item.description: 美国11月个人消费支出保持稳健增长，凸显出假日购物季伊始消费者需求依然强劲。【原文：US personal spending rose at a solid pace in November, underscoring a resilient consumer at the start of the holiday-shopping season.】
